author: wn.com
title: ‘Life and healthcare in the era of cures’ – Monday, 19th October (University of Dundee) ...
text: ( Source : University of Dundee ) Published On Tue 13 Oct 2015 by Grant Hill The hope that scientific breakthroughs offer to sufferers of diseases and the challenging questions they raise will be explored at the University of Dundee next week.
